title: Project Keen
content:
So I'm making this Commander Keen platform engine in this overly flexible RPG creation system called Sphere. Progress is going slow, but right now I got the basic platform system finished, and I uploaded a little beta I'll be expanding over time.

All info can be found here:
[url=http://www.spheredev.org/wiki/Project_Keen]www.spheredev.org/wiki/Project_Keen[/url]

EDIT: if you don't have Sphere, take the download that has Sphere included!____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]
